document.full_text: bank of america corp's  mortgage servicer quality ratings were downgraded by moody's  on tuesday, because of a deterioration in the company's collections and loss mitigation on home loans.
document.title: moody's cuts bofa mortgage servicing ratings
lines_and_colors: bank of america corp's  mortgage servicer quality ratings were downgraded by moody's  on tuesday, because of a deterioration in the company's collections and loss mitigation on home loans.
